title: Napoleon: the end of a dictator
creator_credit: Victor Vicas, Learning Corporation of America and International Film Associates
brief_description: Explores the causes of the downfall of Napoleon, including the weariness caused by war, tyranny in France and the new nationalism throughout Europe.
